snippet: The Israeli leader has reason to be skeptical, but Iran deserves a chance to prove itself.
abstract: Editorial warns that it could be disastrous if Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu and his supporters in the United States Congress are so blinded by distrust of Iran that they block Pres Obama from taking advantage of new diplomatic openings offered by Iranian Pres Hassan Rouhani; contends that Iran deserves a chance to prove itself, but notes that it is reasonable to skeptical of the country's overtures.
lead_paragraph: The Israeli leader has reason to be skeptical, but Iran deserves a chance to prove itself.
